item.title: 董事长称 M&S 网络攻击由 "DragonForce "实施
item.description: 英国零售商玛莎百货公司（Marks & Spencer）董事长阿奇-诺曼（Archie Norman）周二告诉立法者，玛莎百货公司认为，在四月和五月迫使其暂停网上购物六周的网络攻击的煽动者是一个名为 "DragonForce "的组织。【原文：British retailer Marks & Spencer believes the instigator of the cyberattack which forced it to suspend online shopping for six weeks in April and May was a group called "DragonForce", chairman Archie Norman told lawmakers on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，印度计划从 2026 年起从美国进口约 10% 的厨用天然气
item.description: 四位熟悉此事的炼油行业消息人士称，印度计划从2026年开始从美国进口约10%的烹饪用天然气，这也是印度扩大能源采购以缩小与华盛顿贸易差距的努力的一部分。【原文：India plans to source about 10% of its cooking gas imports from the U.S. beginning in 2026 as part of a broader effort to boost energy purchases to narrow its trade gap with Washington, four industry refining sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 受关税上调影响，6月份美国从中国进口的海产品下降了28
item.description: 供应链技术提供商笛卡尔周二表示，6月份美国从中国进口的集装箱货物同比下降了28.3%，此前美国对来自中国这一最大远洋贸易伙伴的货物征收更高的关税，延续了5月份开始的急剧下降。【原文：U.S. imports of containerized goods from China tumbled 28.3% year-on-year in June, after higher tariffs on goods from the country's top ocean trade partner extended a steep drop that began in May, supply chain technology provider Descartes said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 从 "太棒了 "到 "被宠坏了"：日本向特朗普示好的贸易努力如何适得其反
item.description: 今年 2 月，日本首相石破茂首次与唐纳德-特朗普会面时，他承诺在美国投资 1 万亿美元，以此来安抚这位保护主义总统长期以来在贸易问题上对东京的不满。【原文：When Japanese Premier Shigeru Ishiba first met Donald Trump in February, his plan to placate the protectionist president's long-held frustration with Tokyo on trade was a promise to invest $1 trillion in the United States.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士：Jio BlackRock 将以低成本战略颠覆印度基金业
item.description: 三位熟悉 Jio BlackRock 资产管理公司战略的人士表示，该公司计划在年底前在印度推出近十只股票和债务基金，重点关注小规模投资，并绕过分销商以降低成本。【原文：Jio BlackRock Asset Management plans to introduce nearly a dozen equity and debt funds in India by the year-end, focusing on small-ticket investments and bypassing distributors to reduce costs, three people familiar with the firm's strategy said.】

item.title: 联合国贸易机构称，新的贸易战最后期限延长了不稳定性
item.description: 联合国贸易代表处执行主任周二表示，特朗普政府延长关税税率谈判期限的决定正在延长各国的不确定性和不稳定性。【原文：The Trump administration's decision to extend a negotiating deadline for tariff rates is prolonging uncertainty and instability for countries, the executive director of the United Nations trade agency said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 夏日炎炎抵消美国关税阴霾，日本服务业情绪高涨
item.description: 日本政府周二的一项调查显示，由于夏装和休闲需求强劲，抵消了美国关税带来的阴霾，6 月份日本服务业景气略有改善。【原文：Sentiment in Japan's service sector improved slightly in June, a government survey showed on Tuesday, as solid demand for summer clothing and leisure offset the gloom from U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 日产提高可转换债券发行计划后股价大跌
item.description: 在本周刚刚宣布扩大发行可转换债券后，陷入困境的日本日产汽车公司股票周二暴跌超过 6%，跌势延续到第二天。【原文：Shares of Japan's struggling Nissan Motor tumbled more than 6% on Tuesday, extending declines into a second day after it expanded an issuance of convertible bonds announced just this week.】

item.title: 投资者评估美国新关税提案，欧洲股市收平
item.description: 欧洲股市周二表现低迷，因为投资者正在评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普针对一系列国家提出的新关税提案。【原文：European shares were muted on Tuesday as investors assessed U.S. President Donald Trump's new tariff proposals for a spate of countries.】

item.title: 瑞安航空首席执行官表示，夏季预订火爆
item.description: 瑞安航空公司首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）周二表示，夏季主要度假目的地的预订情况十分火爆。【原文：Ryanair has strong bookings for summer for major holiday destinations, Chief Executive Michael O'Leary said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 保时捷上半年全球销量下滑，中国市场跌幅最大
item.description: 德国豪华跑车制造商保时捷周二表示，该公司今年上半年的销售额出现下滑，并将中国市场下滑 28% 的原因归咎于严峻的市场环境和激烈的竞争。【原文：German luxury sports carmaker Porsche said on Tuesday its sales fell in the first half of the year, blaming challenging market conditions and intense competition for a 28% slump in the Chinese market.】

item.title: 被特朗普关税吓到的东南亚力促更多谈判
item.description: 东南亚最大的经济体周二准备加强与华盛顿的贸易谈判，此前华盛顿对这些经济体征收了高额关税，尽管这些经济体在最后关头纷纷提出增加进口和削减对美国商品的征税。【原文：Southeast Asia's biggest economies prepared on Tuesday to step up trade negotiations with Washington after it hit them with steep tariffs, despite a last-ditch flurry of offers to boost imports and slash levies on U.S. goods.】

item.title: 美国关税担忧持续，中国公司押注中国政府将继续严格控制人民币汇率
item.description: 随着美国贸易紧张局势的持续，中国企业和投资者都希望人民币暂时保持稳定并最终贬值，而货币当局的一系列措施和暗示表明，他们的想法可能是正确的。【原文：Chinese businesses and investors are primed for the yuan to stay steady for now and eventually depreciate as U.S. trade tensions drag on, and a string of measures and hints from monetary authorities suggest they may be on the money.】

item.title: 普华永道报告称，到 2035 年，三分之一的芯片生产可能面临铜供应中断的问题
item.description: 咨询公司普华永道（PwC）在本周二为商界领袖撰写的一份报告中指出，到 2035 年，全球约 32% 的半导体生产将面临与气候变化相关的铜供应中断问题，比目前的水平翻两番。【原文：Some 32% of global semiconductor production could face climate change related copper supply disruptions by 2035, quadrupling from today's levels, advisory firm PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) said in a report for business leaders on Tuesday.】

item.title: 诺华首款婴幼儿疟疾药物获批
item.description: 诺华公司周二表示，它已获得瑞士对 Coartem 的批准，并称这是第一种治疗婴幼儿疟疾的药物。【原文：Novartis on Tuesday said it had received approval in Switzerland for Coartem, which it said was the first drug to treat malaria in babies and young children.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，下一任力拓老板有望接受大宗交易并削减成本
item.description: 两位了解力拓新任首席执行官工作重点的人士表示，新任首席执行官可能最快于本月宣布，他应该对转型并购交易以及提高生产力和削减成本持开放态度。【原文：Rio Tinto's , new CEO, who could be announced as soon as this month, should be open to transformative merger and acquisition deals as well as sharpening productivity and cost cuts, said two people aware of the chair's priorities.】

item.title: 战时创新推动以色列国防科技增长，引起全球关注
item.description: 以色列预备役军人扎克-伯格森（Zach Bergerson）看到战友们不得不依靠眼睛和耳朵来探测头顶上成群的敌方无人机时，觉得自己必须采取行动。【原文：Israeli army reservist Zach Bergerson felt he had to take action when he saw fellow soldiers having to rely on their eyes and ears to detect swarms of enemy drones overhead.】

item.title: 特朗普关税让瑞士钟表中心的钟表销售商举步维艰
item.description: 自美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁征收高额关税，对奢侈品行业施加压力以来，卢塞恩的瑞士钟表销售商经历了艰难的三个月。【原文：Swiss watch sellers in Lucerne have endured a tough three months since U.S. President Donald Trump piled pressure on the luxury business with the threat of hefty tariffs, reducing interest from tourists who flock to the city in part to shop for watches.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将利率维持在 3.85% 的稳定水平，令市场大跌眼镜
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二将现金利率维持在 3.85% 的稳定水平，这让曾满怀信心押注降息的市场大跌眼镜，央行称董事会大多数成员希望等待更多信息来证实通胀正在放缓。【原文：Australia's central bank on Tuesday left its cash rate steady at 3.85%, a shock for markets that had confidently wagered on a cut, saying the majority of the board wanted to wait for more information to confirm inflation was slowing.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将利率维持在 3.85%，令市场大跌眼镜
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二将现金利率维持在 3.85% 的稳定水平，这让曾满怀信心押注降息的市场大跌眼镜，央行称董事会大多数成员希望等待更多信息来证实通胀正在放缓。【原文：Australia's central bank on Tuesday left its cash rate steady at 3.85%, a shock for markets that had confidently wagered on a cut, saying the majority of the board wanted to wait for more information to confirm inflation was slowing.】

item.title: 早间竞购：关税似曾相识
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 三星电子将收购医疗保健服务公司 Xealth
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周二表示，已签署协议收购美国医疗保健平台 Xealth，作为其拓展移动医疗保健服务业务的一部分。【原文：Samsung Electronics said on Tuesday it had signed an agreement to acquire Xealth, a U.S.-based healthcare platform, as part of its efforts to expand its mobile healthcare services business.】

item.title: 中国就关税问题警告特朗普，威胁对供应链交易实施报复
item.description: 中国周二警告特朗普政府不要在下个月恢复对其商品征收关税，从而再次引发贸易紧张局势，并威胁要对那些与美国达成交易、将中国从供应链中剔除的国家进行报复。【原文：China warned the Trump administration on Tuesday against reigniting trade tension by restoring tariffs on its goods next month, and threatened to retaliate against nations that strike deals with the United States to cut China out of supply chains.】

item.title: 邦吉公司（Bunge）租用首批阿根廷豆粕运往中国
item.description: 路透社周一获得的数据显示，美国谷物贸易集团邦吉公司（Bunge）已经包租了3万吨阿根廷豆粕货物运往中国，这是自中国政府2019年批准进口阿根廷豆粕以来的首批豆粕货物。【原文：U.S. grains trading group Bunge has chartered 30,000 metric tons of Argentine soybean meal cargo destined for China, data seen by Reuters on Monday showed, marking the first such soymeal cargo since Beijing approved Argentine imports in 2019.】

item.title: 独家报道中国冒全球重稀土供应风险阻止缅甸叛军获胜
item.description: 全球重稀土供应在一定程度上取决于缅甸北部山区叛军与中国支持的军政府之间长达数月的战斗结果。【原文：The global supply of heavy rare earths hinges in part on the outcome of a months-long battle between a rebel army and the Chinese-backed military junta in the hills of northern Myanmar.】

item.title: 高盛因美联储前景和大盘股上调标普 500 指数收益率预期
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）上调了对 S&P 500 指数 3 个月、6 个月和 12 个月的回报率预期，称美国降息预期和主要大盘股基本面的持续强劲是其看好前景的主要驱动因素。【原文：Goldman Sachs has raised its three-, six- and 12-month return forecasts for the S&P 500, citing expectations of U.S. interest rate cuts and continued fundamental strength of major large-cap stocks as key drivers of its positive outlook.】

item.title: 股市持稳，美元因美国关税信函走强；石油下跌
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普推出的关税政策的最新变化泰然处之，美元保持涨势，原油回落。【原文：Stock markets in Asia took in stride the latest twist in U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff roll-out on Tuesday, as the dollar held onto gains and oil retreated.】

item.title: 调查发现，澳大利亚 6 月商业活动反弹
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，由于企业报告销售额和利润率上升，澳大利亚6月份的商业活动大幅反弹，这为需求最终受益于借贷成本下降和通胀降温带来了希望。【原文：Australian business activity rebounded sharply in June as firms reported rising sales and profitability, a survey showed on Tuesday, offering hope demand was finally benefiting from lower borrowing costs and cooling inflation.】

item.title: 特朗普对日本征收 25% 的关税，日元下跌
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布对日本和韩国的商品征收 25% 的关税，这是其混乱的贸易战的最新进展，日元周二大跌，美元持稳。【原文：The yen fell broadly on Tuesday while the dollar held steady as U.S. President Donald Trump unveiled 25% tariffs on goods from Japan and South Korea in the latest development of his chaotic trade war.】

item.title: 交易商评估美国关税和欧佩克+增产，油价有所松动
item.description: 油价在上一交易日上涨近2%后，周二有所回落，原因是投资者评估了美国关税和欧佩克+8月份产量增幅高于预期的新动向。【原文：Oil prices eased on Tuesday after rising almost 2% in the previous session, as investors assessed new developments on U.S. tariffs and a higher-than-expected OPEC+ output hike for August.】
